description: Going on vacation during the Covid-19 pandemic means special precautions must be taken. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: askST: How can I keep Covid-19 at bay while travelling?
title_page: askST: How can I keep Covid-19 at bay while travelling? | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - Going on vacation during the Covid-19 pandemic means special precautions must be taken.
The Straits Times answers your questions on how to keep yourself safe during your next big trip.
